mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_ORG SET SORT_NUM = #{sortNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

UPDATE SYS_ORG SET LEVEL_NUM = #{levelNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, INHERITED_ID = #{inheritedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INHERITED_NAME = #{inheritedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, LAST_UPDATED_DATE = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_ORG (ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, PARENT_ID, INHERITED_ID, INHERITED_NAME, SORT_NUM, LEVEL_NUM, ADDRESS,TEL, REMARK, DELETED, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE,LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE,ORG_CODE) VALUES (#{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{parentId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},'${parentInheritedId}' || '/' || '${orgId}',#{inheritedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sortNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{levelNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{deleted,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SYS_ORG WHERE ORG_ID IN (SELECT ORG_ID FROM SYS_ORG START WITH ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} CONNECT BY PARENT_ID = PRIOR ORG_ID)
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_ORG SET LEVEL_NUM = #{levelNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},INHERITED_ID = #{inheritedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INHERITED_NAME = #{inheritedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=NUMERIC},LAST_UPDATED_DATE = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: SELECT o.ORG_ID, o.ORG_CODE, o.ORG_NAME, o.PARENT_ID,o.INHERITED_ID,o.INHERITED_NAME,o.SORT_NUM, o.LEVEL_NUM, (select case when count(1)=0 then 'open' else 'closed' end from sys_org where DELETED = 0 AND parent_id = o.org_id) as state, o.ADDRESS,o.TEL,o.REMARK,o.CREATED_DATE, o.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, GET_REAL_NAME(o.CREATED_BY) AS CREATED_BY_NAME, GET_REAL_NAME(o.LAST_UPDATED_BY) AS LAST_UPDATED_BY_NAME FROM SYS_ORG o WHERE o.DELETED = 0 AND ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

SELECT o.ORG_ID, o.ORG_CODE, o.ORG_NAME, p.ORG_CODE P_ORG_CODE,o.ADDRESS,o.TEL FROM SYS_ORG o left join SYS_ORG p on (o.PARENT_ID = p.ORG_ID) WHERE o.DELETED = 0 AND o.ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

SELECT o.ORG_ID, o.ORG_CODE, o.ORG_NAME, p.ORG_CODE P_ORG_CODE,o.ADDRESS,o.TEL FROM SYS_ORG o left join SYS_ORG p on (o.PARENT_ID = p.ORG_ID) WHERE o.DELETED = 0 AND o.PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ORDER BY o.SORT_NUM ASC

SELECT o.ORG_ID, o.ORG_CODE, o.ORG_NAME,o.PARENT_ID,o.INHERITED_ID,o.INHERITED_NAME,o.SORT_NUM, o.LEVEL_NUM, (select case when count(1)=0 then 'open' else 'closed' end from sys_org where DELETED = 0 AND parent_id = o.org_id) as state, o.ADDRESS,o.TEL, o.REMARK, o.CREATED_DATE, o.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, GET_REAL_NAME(o.CREATED_BY) AS CREATED_BY_NAME, GET_REAL_NAME(o.LAST_UPDATED_BY) AS LAST_UPDATED_BY_NAME FROM SYS_ORG o WHERE o.DELETED = 0 AND PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ORDER BY SORT_NUM ASC
SELECT max(o.SORT_NUM) FROM SYS_ORG o WHERE o.DELETED = 0 AND PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

SELECT o.ORG_ID,o.INHERITED_ID,o.INHERITED_NAME, o.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, GET_REAL_NAME(o.LAST_UPDATED_BY) AS LAST_UPDATED_BY_NAME FROM SYS_ORG o WHERE o.DELETED = 0 AND PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ORDER BY SORT_NUM ASC

SELECT o.ORG_ID, o.ORG_CODE, o.ORG_NAME,o.PARENT_ID,o.INHERITED_ID,o.INHERITED_NAME,o.SORT_NUM, o.LEVEL_NUM,o.ADDRESS,o.TEL,o.REMARK FROM SYS_ORG o WHERE o.DELETED = 0 AND ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT o.ORG_CODE,o.ORG_NAME,p.ORG_CODE P_ORG_CODE,o.ADDRESS,o.TEL FROM SYS_ORG o left join SYS_ORG p on (o.PARENT_ID = p.ORG_ID) WHERE o.DELETED = 0 ORDER BY o.ORG_CODE
